|brand = EnGenius |model = ECB600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/28/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/EnGenius_ECB600 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point,bridge |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A8J-ECB600 |icid = 10103A-ECB600 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A060700g |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 560<!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 88:DC:96 |oui = 88:DC:96
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt Kamikaze;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = at/af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, H1 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, H5
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SNMP, PoE, |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;2;,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2576L;;2;,,, IEEE 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;3;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = EnGeniusXXXXXX-2.4G, EnGeniusXXXXXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = ^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-2.4G$, ^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/28/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 655216005846 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CWIKET0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ECB600-0.40 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The 5GHz radio (AR9344) is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE5003L / 5003L 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs]
Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID patterns appear to be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-2.4G''' and '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-5G'''.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ECB600_DS_051313.pdf Datasheet]
